languages.text: "Приятно видеть, что вы осваиваетесь на корабле".

traits.locale_text: "Приятно видеть, что вы осваиваетесь на корабле".

languages.text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
languages.original_text: "Приятно видеть, что вы осваиваетесь на корабле".

traits.locale_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
"It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
"It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
"It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
"It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

languages.text: "Schön, dass Ihr Euch an das Leben an Bord des Schiffs gewöhnt."
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Schön, dass Ihr Euch an das Leben an Bord des Schiffs gewöhnt."

languages.text: « Cela me fait plaisir de voir que vous vous adaptez à la vie à bord du vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

traits.locale_text: « Cela me fait plaisir de voir que vous vous adaptez à la vie à bord du vaisseau. »

languages.text: “我很高兴看到你已经适应了飞船上的生活。”
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴看到你已经适应了飞船上的生活。”

languages.text: 「あなたがこの船の上での生活に適応しているのを見ると、嬉しく思う」
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがこの船の上での生活に適応しているのを見ると、嬉しく思う」

languages.text: «Me complace ver que se adapta a la vida a bordo de la nave».
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Me complace ver que se adapta a la vida a bordo de la nave».

languages.text: "Gemi hayatına uyum sağlıyor olduğunu görmek güzel."
languages.original_text: "It pleases me to see you adjusting to life aboard the ship."
